amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the Affordable Housing Trust Fund budgetary placeholder language in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the Affordable Housing Trust Fund budgetary placeholder language in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 263 (Roll no. 392).
